[{"id":"dev-17806","entityId":"86-23050","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[checkout] no checkout possible if terms and conditions are lacking"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Stefan Seitz"},{"name":"created","value":"1583148197327"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17806"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/settingsLegal
Product ID54197
Account emaildon-stefano3@gmx.de, info@laserwerk.net
Supplier ID13069, 27522
Order #19939XXXXX
Novomind Ticket ID85486



#### Steps to reproduce:
1. Login > Settings > Legal > delete all terms and conditions, privacy policy, legal notice etc.
2. set "Legal notice" option to following settings > save

3. https://test-ep.regiondo.de/testangebot-31600 > choose any date, qty, option etc, add to cart > finish checkout using cash payment > click "buy now" button


#### Actual result:
When having no terms and conditions and settings for legal notice are on "unchecked checkbox should be shown"
Error message appears "Please accept our terms and conditions" although no checkbox is shown and no other legal notice is showndue to deploy of https://track.regiondo.com/issue/dev-16644
No checkout possible


#### Expected result:

No Error message should appear, checkout should be possible
A solution for this https://track.regiondo.com/issue/dev-16644#focus=streamItem-88-65912.0-0 should be deployed.

Maksym Hopei we already talked about this specific case in https://track.regiondo.com/issue/dev-16644#focus=streamItem-88-65918.0-0

When supplier did not provided his legal notice, the checkbox should be per default checked to avoid this issue

URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/bookings
Product ID26734
Account emailinfo@ice-mountain.com
Supplier ID11329
Novomind Ticket ID53773
EnvironmentWindows 10, Version 76.0.3809.132 (Official Build) (64-bit)

Steps to reproduce:

  1. login to info@ice-mountain.com and go to Dashboard » Bookings »Booking overview
  2. Search the name: "passemier"
  3. Click on any Reservation with this name

Actual result:

504 gateway time-out

Expected result:

Reservation should open in order to be modified or confirmed

URLhttps://www.regiondo-test-de.de/reseller/partner/bookingwidget
Supplier ID1857
Account emailinfo@sport-piraten.de

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Competitor will use our widget code to find all our clients
  2. Incremental Supplier ID in code is problematic

Actual result:

<div class="regiondo-booking-widget"
data-locale="de_DE"
data-provider="1857"
data-product="11999"
data-title="Schneeschuhtour am Schliersee mit Zipflbobfahrt"
data-url="https://sport-piraten.regiondo-test-de.de/"
data-gift-option="true"
data-font="Open Sans"></div>
<script id="regiondo-js" src="https://www.regiondo-test-de.de/js/integration/bookingwidget/bookingwidget.js"></script>

Expected result:

Do not mention name of supplier in code
Use datacode approach as for calendar widget

<div id="regiondo-calendar-widget" data-code="1857-d2f09e607243576635d0e0b7c5948d1c" data-locale="de_DE" data-apiurl="https://www.regiondo-test-de.de/" data-sf="0" data-sp="0" data-vt="d"></div><script type="text/javascript" src="https://www.regiondo-test-de.de/js/integration/calendarwidget/calendarwidget.js"></script>

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksym Hopei"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"y.maurer"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"5"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"m.hopei"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1583139262757"},{"name":"When is it needed ?","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Security"],"valueId":["Security"],"color":{"bg":"#e30000","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"State","value":["In Progress"],"valueId":["In Progress"],"color":{"bg":"#0070e4","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Reproducible","value":["Yes"],"valueId":["Yes"],"color":null},{"name":"Account Segment","value":["All"],"valueId":["All"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"m.hopei","fullName":"Maksym Hopei"}]},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"First sprint","id":"Team Zulu:First sprint"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"88-64905","author":"sergey.chorny","authorFullName":"Sergey Chorny","issueId":"dev-17140","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksym Hopei

As discussed, maybe we should change reseller id to reseller code, which is unique and assigned to reseller in magento admin.

As for product - maybe it could be good idea to change id to SKU or to url key.

Please, check what we can do to prevent competitors to abuse our widget with auto incremental ids guessing.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1578656553155,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-66117","author":"sergey.chorny","authorFullName":"Sergey Chorny","issueId":"dev-17140","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksym Hopei
/widgets/booking/settings?locale=de_DE&provider=RE57&product=T-RE57-105731
As discussed please add provider code and sku value to the dashboard widget page, so I can populate these values to generated widget code.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1582706382770,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-66125","author":"y.maurer","authorFullName":"Yann Maurer","issueId":"dev-17140","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Walid Dechri plase check if the last comment of @Sergey Chorny is suitable for DMO implementations using our API (e.g. Experience côte d'azur)

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1582708468465,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-66132","author":"walid.dechri","authorFullName":"Walid Dechri","issueId":"dev-17140","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Sergey Chorny
Could you please inform me how we will generate Provider ID e.g provider=RE57 ?
Some suppliers/ partner are using API and build automatically their widget therefore all data used for building Booking widget Reac should be also available.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1582710816430,"updated":1582710863189,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-66140","author":"sergey.chorny","authorFullName":"Sergey Chorny","issueId":"dev-17140","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Walid Dechri @Maksym Hopei
I assume this reseller code is unique and assigned to reseller by our team, once reseller create account. Is it correct?
If so, then there is no difference if we use id or code on backend, it is for you to decide, is it ok if we switch to use only code, so we can restrict usage of numeric id.

Moreover, if we load widget on specific domain, eg. sport-piraten.regiondo.de, then we might not need to use provider id/code at all, as we can match domain. So we can remove provider parameter from widget (need to discuss with Maksym how it applies to partner logic). However, we might need to have possibility to load widget by provider unique code to work with project locally, for development needs.

As for exiting implementations using API it is not related. For the implementations similar to sport piraten (generating widget code dynamically) - they need to update their code to use new widget anyway.

When provider code assigned to reseller, we can show this code in reseller dashboard, so for reseller it would be easy to identify that this code also used for widget snippet. Similar to other websites where they assign user some support id, so when you request online help, you provide this id, so they can easily identify you as user.

It needs to understand when exactly this code assigned to reseller, as for newly created resellers we need to think about an alternative, so they can explore our dashboard/features/widgets without this code, while restricting possibilty to find supplier domain by numeric brute force.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1582713609898,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-14052","entityId":"86-13978","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[calendar overview] wrong availabilites shown"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Stefan Seitz"},{"name":"created","value":"1502445233024"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"14052"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/availabilities
Product ID23612
Product ID24639
Account emailinfo@driving-area.de
Supplier ID11542
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 60.0.3112.90 (Offizieller Build) (64-Bit)

What steps will reproduce the problem?
A)
https://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/availabilities>date 02/09> check availability (6/7)>only 5 participants are shown (Atts. 96,97)

B)
https://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/availabilities>date 22/09 Offer:"VIP - Schräglagen-Training - BMW Block am Ring"> check availability (2/5)>has to be shown as (1/1/5) because one participant has been cancelled (Att. 98,99)

What is the expected result?

availabilities should be shown correctly in calendar

A) 5/7

B)
1/1/5

What happens instead?

wrong availabilities shown

For Case A) originally the capacity was 6, therefore shown as sold out in frontend. because of that, capacity was manually changed to 7.

URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/availabilities
Product ID23432
Account emailinfo@driving-area.de
Supplier ID11542
EnvironmentWindows 7, Firefox 54.0 (32-Bit)

1. Go to https://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/availabilities
2. search for Date 09.09.2017
3. Overview is showing 7/7
4. Click on view participants
5. You only have 5 confirmed bookings and 2 canceled bookings

What is expected:
To get the right overview (5/2/7)

What happen instead:
The overview is shown 7/7

Further more for one participant is missing infos like (Email, Name, Telephone, bookingnummer)

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1581672530451,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-17192","entityId":"86-22660","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[POS][API] Social login with facebook and google"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktoriia Karenko"},{"name":"created","value":"1579785912463"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17192"},{"name":"description","value":"

Please add possibility to login with google and facebook with new oAuth2.0.
If reseller for current email doesn't exist please return an error "Unfortunately we cannot find a Regiondo account for this email address".

Input data:

access_token=facebook/google_access_token
scope=reseller-data,
grant_type=social_login,
client_id=POS,
client_secret=client_secret

Output data:

Same as we have for normal login

[{"id":"dev-17227","entityId":"86-22737","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[gift voucher redemption] decline of booking request for invisible price lists not possible"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Stefan Seitz"},{"name":"created","value":"1580740777805"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17227"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.com/resellers/account/bookingsview/key/
Product ID106594
Account emailiris.gligorea@regiondo.com
Supplier ID23776
Order #1980837026
Novomind Ticket ID79604



#### Steps to reproduce:
1. https://itsoftwaresibiu.regiondo.com/categories > Offer "Optional: Ticketshop title" > buy 1 ticket as gift for variation "2nd price list", option "asdadfafa" > complete purchase
2. Login > manage offers > my offers > product 106594 > Step 3 > set option "asdadfafa" to invisible > save and publish
3. https://itsoftwaresibiu.regiondo.com/voucher > redeem voucher for any date > request date
4. bookings > bookings > check booking for redeemed gift voucher


#### Actual result:

only "apply changes" button appears, clickng this button is followed by no action
no possibility to decline booking




#### Expected result:

Same as in https://track.regiondo.com/issue/dev-16595

When customer redeems gift certificate for an offer with invisible price list, supplier should have the same booking details template like offer with manual confirmation in order to let supplier decide if he accepts or declines the request.

When supplier declines the request, only value voucher should be proposed as refund method.

Refund should be done to the attendee not to the buyer

After refund system should send email template 58 to attendee

@Walid Dechri, this all looks like intentional behaviour. You mentioned that this “Apply changes” functionality must not be there, but the only case when it is there is when the redeemed option is not visible or doesn't exist anymore. Please suggest how to proceed.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1581497759869,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-17192","entityId":"86-22660","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[POS][API] Social login with facebook and google"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktoriia Karenko"},{"name":"created","value":"1579785912463"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17192"},{"name":"description","value":"

Please add possibility to login with google and facebook with new oAuth2.0.
If reseller for current email doesn't exist please return an error "Unfortunately we cannot find a Regiondo account for this email address".

Input data:

access_token=facebook/google_access_token
scope=reseller-data,
grant_type=social_login,
client_id=POS,
client_secret=client_secret

Output data:

Same as we have for normal login
